message: Let's start with a fair-ish split. I'll take the bigger share, but you still get something!
Let's try a more balanced split, closer to 50/50, but I'll take a bit more since I had to reject your initial low offer
Let's try a more even split, closer to 50/50. I'm willing to give up some of my previous share to reach a compromise.
I see we're getting closer, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about we swap the numbers from your last offer?
Let's just split it right down the middle.  No more arguing, no more back and forth. 50/50 is the fairest way to do this.
